page.title: 06INDUSTRY IN TOFTWOOD
page.content: The majority of firms on this estate only employ one or two people and they are housed in special start up units. These units contain basic services and are offered on low rental. A wide variety of products are produced here such as fibre glass mouldings and various light engineering concerns. It is hoped that some of these firms will expand and take on extra workers but at the present time a number of units are unoccupied and several firms have closed down in recent years. On this same estate, an Industrial Training Centre was opened by the council in 1984 to provide technical training for school leavers. At present over 60 youngsters are enrolled on these one year courses in the hope that they will be better equipped to find a job.
